pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Charcoal Nose Strips
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This Charcoal Nose Strip acts as a magnet, attracting dirt and oil fromthe skin’s pores for more refined, clearer looking skin.

- Removes blackheads instantly

- Tightens skin’s pores and soothes redness

- Assists in preventing blackheads

Ingredients

Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Alcohol Denat., Silica, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Water, Charcoal Powder, Titanium Dioxide, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Iron Oxides, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum/Fragrance.

Directions

Remove nose strip from packaging. After cleansing thoroughly wet nose, the strip won’t stick on a dry nose. Dry hands. Peel strip off plastic liner. Apply to nose area, smooth side down, pressing down to ensure good contact with skin. Leave the strip to dry for 15 – 20 minutes or until stiff to the touch. Slowly peel off the strip starting from the outer edges towards the centre. Rinse off any remaining residue.
